text: In UI Toolkit, what is the purpose of a ScrollView?

options.text: To create a view that can be scrolled horizontally or vertically
To create a view that can be rotated
To create a view that can be zoomed in or out

feedbackCorrect: In UI Toolkit, a ScrollView is used to create a view that can be scrolled horizontally or vertically. This is especially useful when the content is too large to fit within the visible area.
feedbackIncorrect: In UI Toolkit, a ScrollView is not used to create a scrolling background, a view that can be rotated, or a view that can be zoomed in or out. Instead, it's used to create a view that can be scrolled horizontally or vertically, especially when the content is too large to fit within the visible area.
